sentences.english: Conclusion ROP is the leading cause of blindness of students in Guangzhou Blind School.

sentences.english: That means that this is no longer simple myopia, but a diseased eye.

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
